articles.title: Lifevibe VAT Chair Prime速- The World's First Consumer-Grade Vibroacoustic Therapy Chair Officially Launched
articles.mainIdea: Lifevibe VAT Chair Prime速- The World's First Consumer-Grade Vibroacoustic Therapy Chair Officially Launched
articles.summary: GlobeNewswire: Lifevibe VAT Chair Prime速- The World's First Consumer-Grade Vibroacoustic Therapy Chair Officially Launched. Montclair, CA, Dec. 23, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Lifevibe速 has launched the Vibroacoustic Therapy Chair, the first consumer-grade vibroacoustic therapy chair (VAT Massage Chair) for home usage. This marks a significant milestone in wellness technology. The introduction represents a significant first-to-market breakthrough: clinically proven medical technology previously used in European rehabilitation centers is now available as an attractive, accessible, and engaging consumer product.
